workshoptitle: Trace a Native Cloud App Utilizing Oracle Application Performance Monitoring

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create APM Domain and obtain Data Upload Endpoint and Data Keys
tutorials.description: Create APM Domain and obtain Data Upload Endpoint and Data Keys

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Setup APM Tracer in Maven & Helidon, and build custom spans in Java
tutorials.description: Setup APM Tracer in Maven & Helidon, and build custom spans in Java

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Update API Gateway, configure APM Browser Agent, and update Object Storage
tutorials.description: Update API Gateway, configure APM Browser Agent, and update Object Storage

tutorials.title: Lab 5: View traces and spans in APM Trace Explorer
tutorials.description: View traces and spans in APM Trace Explorer

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
